WhisperX Alignment.description: Align text transcripts with audio to get accurate word-level timestamps using WhisperX forced alignment

audio.name: Audio
audio.tooltip: Audio data from ComfyUI's official audio loader

input_type.name: Input Type
input_type.tooltip: Choose between plain text or JSON format input

text_input.name: Text Input
text_input.tooltip: Your text content - plain text or JSON segments array

language.name: Language
language.tooltip: Language code for alignment model selection

auto_segment.name: Auto Segment
auto_segment.tooltip: Automatically segment text into smaller chunks based on punctuation

max_chars_per_segment.name: Max Chars Per Segment
max_chars_per_segment.tooltip: Maximum characters per segment when auto-segment is enabled (50-1000)

max_chars_per_sentence.name: Max Chars Per Sentence
max_chars_per_sentence.tooltip: Maximum characters per sentence for sentence-level output (10-200)

return_char_alignments.name: Return Char Alignments
return_char_alignments.tooltip: Include character-level alignment in addition to word-level

model_name.name: Model Name
model_name.tooltip: Leave as 'auto' for automatic model selection, or specify a model folder name from ComfyUI/models/whisperx/

device.name: Device
device.tooltip: Computing device to use (auto, cuda, or cpu)

0.name: Aligned Segments
0.tooltip: JSON array of text segments with accurate timestamps (based on max_chars_per_segment)

1.name: Word Segments
1.tooltip: JSON array of individual words with precise timing

2.name: Sentence Segments
2.tooltip: JSON array of sentence-level segments (approx. max_chars_per_sentence chars each) with timestamps and word details

3.name: Alignment Info
3.tooltip: Metadata about the alignment process (model used, statistics, etc.)
